clip.quote: I try to do a balance of 25% real estate, 75% hobbies and interesting stuff.
clip.why_clipworthy: It provides a clear strategy for engaging social media content.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to know the secret to engaging your audience on social media?

script:
```json
{
  "SCRIPT": {
    "HOOK": "Want to know the secret to engaging your audience on social media?",
    "SETUP": "Ryan Overcash shares his strategy for captivating content. It's not just about real estate; it's about balance.",
    "INSIGHT": "Ryan suggests a 25% focus on real estate and 75% on hobbies and interesting stuff. This mix keeps your audience intrigued and coming back for more.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "By diversifying your content, you not only showcase your expertise but also build a relatable personal brand.",
    "CTA": "Try this strategy today! What hobbies will you share to connect with your audience?"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Balance is key! Mix real estate with personal interests for engaging content. #SocialMediaStrategy",
  "HASHTAGS": [
    "#RealEstateTips",
    "#SocialMedia",
    "#PersonalBranding",
    "#ContentCreation",
    "#Engagement"
  ],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "top_producer_secrets"
}
```

clip.quote: People are going to want some type of representation. There is value there.
clip.why_clipworthy: Reframes the conversation around commission changes as an opportunity.
clip.suggested_hook: Worried about commission changes? Here's why you shouldn't be.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Worried about commission changes? Here's why you shouldn't be.",
    "SETUP": "Meet Ryan Overcash, a real estate expert who sees opportunity where others see obstacles. Commission changes got you stressed? Listen up.",
    "INSIGHT": "Ryan believes that even with commission shifts, people will always seek representation. The value you bring as an agent is irreplaceable.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "Instead of fearing change, focus on showcasing your unique value. Use this shift to strengthen your client relationships.",
    "CTA": "Think about how you can highlight your value. Share your thoughts below or tag a fellow agent who needs to hear this!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Commission changes? Embrace the opportunity to showcase your value! #RealEstateMindset",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstateMindset", "#CommissionChanges", "#AgentValue", "#RealEstateAdvice", "#Opportunity"],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "real_talk"
}
```
